sn4.4:1: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—​ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṁ vihārati isipatane migadāye. Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi: "bhikkhavo"ti.
sn4.4:2: "Mayhaṁ kho, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā yoniso sammappadhānā anuttarā vimutti anuppattā, anuttarā vimutti sacchikatā. Tumhepi, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā yoniso sammappadhānā anuttaraṁ vimuttiṁ anupāpuṇātha, anuttaraṁ vimuttiṁ sacchikarothā"ti.
sn4.4:3: "Baddhosi mārapāsena,ye dibbā ye ca mānusā;Mārabandhanabaddhosi,na me samaṇa mokkhasī"ti.
sn4.4:4: "Muttāhaṁ mārapāsena,Ye dibbā ye ca mānusā;Mārabandhanamuttomhi,Nihato tvamasi antakā"ti.
sn4.4:5: Atha kho māro pāpimā … pe … tatthevantaradhāyīti.
